Description:
As AI adoption accelerates, organizations are transforming their data platforms to keep pace. Without a unified, enterprise-ready foundation, even the most ambitious AI strategies can stall. Join Amir Netz, Technical Fellow and CTO of Microsoft Fabric, as he shares the latest data and analytics announcements, developments and demos for Fabric.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/ignite25-plans-MicrosoftFabricAIDataSolutionsPlan ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€: \* Amir Netz ğ—¦ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2025 event. View even more sessions on-demand and learn about Microsoft Ignite at https://ignite.microsoft.com

BRK224 | English (US) | Unify your data platform, Microsoft Fabric Breakout | Intermediate (200) #MSIgnite, #Unifyyourdataplatform

Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction by Amir Nets and session overview 00:08:35 - Announcement of SQL and NoSQL SaaS databases in Fabric 00:12:10 - Integrating alert functions with Cosmos DB in development environments 00:15:41 - Comparing Synapse and Fabric Data Warehouses: migrations and new features 00:17:25 - Introducing Fabric Graph modeling for knowledge and relationships 00:23:00 - Microsoft Fabric Graph powers Microsoft Sentinel for advanced threat detection 00:25:06 - Capacity overage billing and workspace-level surge protection 00:36:50 - Extending OneLake access to multiple Microsoft and third-party tools via open APIs and formats 00:41:17 - Introduction of Fabric IQ bringing semantic models into operational data models with ontology concept
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Microsoft Fabric: The data platform for the next AI frontier | BRK224
